title: 2009 Senior Class Gift Fund
description: Funds from the 2009 Senior Class Gift will be used to support three projects at the University of Colorado Boulder.  The projects are the Norlin Library Renovation, the Senior Class Norlin Scholarship Endowment and the Senior Class Legacy Ball.
marketingContent: Funds from the 2009 Senior Class Gift will be used to support three projects at the University of Colorado Boulder.  The projects are the Norlin Library Renovation, the Senior Class Norlin Scholarship Endowment and the Senior Class Legacy Ball.
